description: The final scene of Down Right Dangerous is a groupgathering featuring the rock-hard cocks of Rick Hammersmith, ParkerWilliams, Matt Sizemore, and Nick Piston. Rick takes all three of themin quick succession, with his daddy, Parker Williams, coming home inhis comfortable hole to finish off the flick. Never have we seen somuch cum fly before our cameras. These guys are sex pigs andmaking this movie was exactly what each of them wanted to do.If you have ever been to a sleazy sex club, or if you have justwondered what one was like, this movie is a must-own. Other studioshave attempted to capture real sex club energy, only to fall far short ofthe mark. For the real thing go to the name you can trust:Raging Stallion Studios. Any other choice is Down RightDangerous!
title: Down Right Dangerous
